lead_paragraph: Chelsea captain John Terry is showing all the qualities of a future manager, the club's interim boss Guus Hiddink said on Friday.

headline.print_headline: Terry Has Look of a Future Manager, Says Hiddink
headline.main: Terry Has Look of a Future Manager, Says Hiddink

snippet: Chelsea captain John Terry is showing all the qualities of a future manager, the club's interim boss Guus Hiddink said on Friday....
